:• '''4620Mbps''' - 1-stream 802.11ad device (MCS12/16-QAM (3/4)), :• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''800Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''7200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Talon AD7200 Multi-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :[http://www.tp-link.com/en/products/details/cat-9_AD7200.html Product page] *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/TE7/AD7200 TE7AD7200], Contains FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCA9008-SBD1 PPD-QCA9008-SBD1] {{see also|Qualcomm|TP-LINK}} ===Reviews=== *[http://www.hardwarezone.com.sg/review-tp-link-talon-ad7200-80211ad-router-review-blazing-ahead-60ghz ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Router'' on '''HardwareZone'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33009-tp-link-talon-ad7200-multi-band-wi-fi-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Talon AD7200 Multi-Band Wi-Fi Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 256 MB :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*60GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9500 1x1 (AD4600) ::- [[Qualcomm Atheros QCA9008-SBD1]] module :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE) *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32871-tp-link-archer-c2600-ac-2600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C2600 AC 2600 Wireless Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 32 MB (SPI) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE) ===News=== *[https://www.qualcomm.com/news/releases/2016/01/05/qualcomm-80211ad-products-lead-way-multi-band-wi-fi-ecosystem ''Qualcomm 802.11ad Products for Multi-band Wi-Fi Ecosystem'' on '''Qualcomm'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2016/32915-tp-link-ces-2016-announcements ''TP-LINK CES 2016 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*[[TP-LINK AD7200 (Talon)]] - ''AD7200 Multi-band Wi-Fi Router'' (802.11ac/ad) ::4620Mbps (60GHz) / 1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz) (AC2600) ::AC2600 4x4 [[Qualcomm]] MU-MIMO with single-stream 802.11ad radio ::[[Qualcomm]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, 2x USB 3.0 ports, 8x ext. antennas :*[[TP-LINK Archer C5400 v1.x]] - ''AC5300 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C5400 FCC] ::2x 2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3150]] - ''AC3100 Wireless Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3150 FCC] ::2167Mbps (5GHz) / 1000Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 [[Broadcom]] 1024-QAM ::[[Broadcom]] @1.4GHz dual core CPU, Wi-Fi co-processors in each radio :*[[TP-LINK SR20]] - ''AC1900 Smart Home Router with Touchscreen'' ::1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), ZigBee and Z-Wave ::@1GHz dual-core CPU, USB 2.0/3.0 ports, SD Card slot, 4.3" display *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces/ces-2015/32593-tp-link-debuts-ac-router-duo ''TP-LINK Debuts AC Router Duo - CES 2015'' on '''SmallNetBuilder''''] :*[[TP-LINK Archer C3200]] - ''AC3200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C3200 FCC] ::2x 1300Mbps (5GHz) / 600Mbps (2.4GHz), [[Broadcom]]'s XStream :*[[TP-LINK Archer C2600 v1.x|TP-LINK Archer C2600]] - ''AC2600 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router'' [https://fccid.io/TE7C2600 FCC] ::1733Mbps (5GHz) / 800Mbps (2.4GHz), 4x4 AC [[Qualcomm]] QCA9980 ===See also=== *[[List of 802.11ad Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] ==Images== __NOTOC__
